data.name: importCsvFile
data.label: Import CSV File
data.description: Imports a .csv file from an online resource given its url.

parameters.name: --query-string
parameters.label: Query string
parameters.description: Query string to be added to the URL

parameters.name: --rename
parameters.label: Rename to
parameters.description: Rename the file to the given name

contributor.affiliation: Antonio BenÃ­tez Hidalgo; Khaos Research Group

data.name: calculate-ps
data.label: Calculate PS
data.description: Calculate the main parameters of the pollen season with regard to phenology and pollen intensity

parameters.name: --method
parameters.label: Calculation Method
parameters.description: Method applied to calculate the pollen season and parameters (options: percentage, logistic, moving, clinical or grains)

parameters.name: --thDay
parameters.label: Number of Days
parameters.description: Number of days for pollen concentration calculation

parameters.name: --perc
parameters.label: Percentage
parameters.description: Percentage of total annual pollen for 'percentage' method

parameters.name: --defSeason
parameters.label: Season Selection Method
parameters.description: Method for selecting the best annual period (options: natural, interannual or peak)

parameters.name: --reduction
parameters.label: Data Reduction
parameters.description: Reduction of pollen data for 'logistic' method

parameters.name: --man
parameters.label: Moving Average Order
parameters.description: Order of moving average for 'moving' method

parameters.name: --nClinical
parameters.label: Number of Days for Clinical Method

parameters.name: --thPollen
parameters.label: Threshold for Clinical or Grains Method

parameters.name: --type
parameters.label: Pollen Type for Clinical Method
parameters.description: Pollen type for 'clinical' method (options: birch, grasses, cypress, olive, ragweed or none)

parameters.name: --intMethod
parameters.label: Interpolation Method
parameters.description: Interpolation method (options: lineal, movingmean, spline or tseries)

data.name: plot-normsummary
data.label: Plot Normsummary
data.description: Plots the pollen data amplitude during several seasons: daily average pollen concentration over the study period, maximum pollen concentration of each day over the study period and minimum pollen concentration of each day value over the study period

data.name: plot-trend
data.label: Plot Trend
data.description: calculates the main seasonal indexes of the pollen season (Start Date, Peak Date, End Date and Pollen Integral)

parameters.name: --method
parameters.label: Pollen Season Calculation Method
parameters.description: Method for calculating the pollen season

data.name: iplot-abundance
data.label: Iplot abundance
data.description: Plot relative abundance of each type of pollen in a certain range of years

parameters.name: --nTypes
parameters.label: Number of Pollen Types
parameters.description: Number of most abundant pollen types to be represented in the plot of the relative abundance

parameters.name: --yStart
parameters.label: Start Year
parameters.description: Start year for calculating relative abundances of pollen types

parameters.name: --yEnd
parameters.label: End Year
parameters.description: End year for calculating relative abundances of pollen types

parameters.name: --interpolation
parameters.label: Apply Interpolation
parameters.description: Apply interpolation to complete gaps with no data

parameters.name: --intMethod
parameters.label: Interpolation Method
parameters.description: Interpolation method (options: lineal, movingmean, spline or tseries)

parameters.name: --colBar
parameters.label: Bar Color
parameters.description: Color of the bars for the plot

parameters.name: --exclude
parameters.label: Excluded Pollen Types
parameters.description: Names of pollen types to be excluded from the plot

data.name: plot-ps
data.label: Plot PS
data.description: Plot pollen grains concentration for one pollen type in a specific year

parameters.name: --pollenType
parameters.label: Pollen Type
parameters.description: Name of the pollen type to be plotted

parameters.name: --days
parameters.label: Number of Days
parameters.description: Number of days beyond each side of the main pollen season to be represented

parameters.name: --filCol
parameters.label: Fill Color
parameters.description: Color to fill the main pollen season in the plot

parameters.name: --axisname
parameters.label: Y Axis Title
parameters.description: Y axis title of the plot

parameters.name: --intMethod
parameters.label: Interpolation Method
parameters.description: Interpolation method (options: lineal, movingmean, spline or tseries)

data.name: analyse-trend
data.label: Analyse Trend
data.description: Perform Analyse Trend over pollen data

parameters.name: --interpolation
parameters.label: Apply Interpolation
parameters.description: Apply interpolation to fill gaps in data

parameters.name: --intMethod
parameters.label: Interpolation Method
parameters.description: Interpolation method (options: lineal, movingmean, tseries or spline)

parameters.name: --method
parameters.label: Pollen Season Calculation Method
parameters.description: Method for calculating pollen season (options: percentage, logistic, moving, clinical or grains)

parameters.name: --quantil
parameters.label: Quantile
parameters.description: Quantile of data to display (between 0 and 1)

parameters.name: --significant
parameters.label: Significance Level
parameters.description: Significance level for linear trends analysis

parameters.name: --split
parameters.label: Split Plot
parameters.description: Split the plot based on variable nature

data.name: plot-summary
data.label: Plot Summary
data.description: Plot pollen data during several seasons

parameters.name: --method
parameters.label: Pollen Season Calculation Method
parameters.description: Method for calculating the pollen season

parameters.name: --nTypes
parameters.label: Number of Abundant Pollen Types
parameters.description: Number of abundant pollen types in the calendar

parameters.name: --thDay
parameters.label: Threshold for Counting Days
parameters.description: Threshold for counting days when pollen level is exceeded

parameters.name: --perc
parameters.label: Percentage of Total Annual Pollen
parameters.description: Percentage of total annual pollen for pollen season

parameters.name: --defSeason
parameters.label: Method for Selecting Annual Period
parameters.description: Method for selecting annual period (natural, interannual, peak)

parameters.name: --reduction
parameters.label: Reduce Peaks in Pollen Data
parameters.description: Reduce peaks in pollen data (only for logistic method)

parameters.name: --redLevel
parameters.label: Percentile for Reducing Peaks
parameters.description: Percentile for reducing peaks (only for logistic method)

parameters.name: --man
parameters.label: Order of Moving Average
parameters.description: Order of moving average (only for moving method)

parameters.name: --nClinical
parameters.label: Number of Days for Clinical Method
parameters.description: Number of days for clinical method

parameters.name: --thPollen
parameters.label: Threshold for Clinical and Grains Methods
parameters.description: Threshold for clinical and grains methods

parameters.name: --thSum
parameters.label: Pollen Threshold for Sum in Clinical Method
parameters.description: Pollen threshold for sum in clinical method

parameters.name: --type
parameters.label: Pollen Type for Clinical Method
parameters.description: Pollen type for clinical method (birch, grasses, cypress, olive, ragweed)

parameters.name: --interpolation
parameters.label: Apply Interpolation
parameters.description: Apply interpolation to fill gaps (default: TRUE)

data.name: iplot-pollen
data.label: Iplot pollen
data.description: Plot the pollen samples for each day in a specific year

data.name: iplot-year
data.label: Iplot Year
data.description: Plot the pollen samples for each day for a specific pollen

data.name: quality-control
data.label: Quality Control
data.description: Perform quality control over pollen data

parameters.name: --window
parameters.label: Window
parameters.description: A numeric (integer) value bigger or equal to 1

parameters.name: --ps_method
parameters.label: Pollen Season Calculation Method
parameters.description: A character string specifying the method applied to calculate the pollen season

parameters.name: --result
parameters.label: Result Format
parameters.description: A character string specifying the format of the results (table or plot)

data.name: pollen-calendar
data.label: Pollen Calendar
data.description: Plot pollen callendar for a specific range of years

parameters.name: --method
parameters.label: Method
parameters.description: Method to calculate and generate the pollen calendar (options: heatplot, violinplot or phenological, default: heatplot)

parameters.name: --nTypes
parameters.label: Number of Types
parameters.description: Number of most abundant pollen types to be represented in the pollen calendar (default: 15)

parameters.name: --startMonth
parameters.label: Start Month
parameters.description: Month (1-12) when the pollen calendar starts (default: 1)

parameters.name: --yStart
parameters.label: Start Year
parameters.description: Start year for the pollen calendar (default: NULL)

parameters.name: --yEnd
parameters.label: End Year
parameters.description: End year for the pollen calendar (default: NULL)

parameters.name: --thPollen
parameters.label: Pollen Threshold
parameters.description: Minimum threshold of average pollen concentration (default: 1)

parameters.name: --averageMethod
parameters.label: Average Method
parameters.description: Moment of the application of the average (options: avg_before or avg_after, default: avg_before)

parameters.name: --period
parameters.label: Period
parameters.description: Interval time for the pollen calendar (options: daily or weekly, default: daily)

parameters.name: --methodClasses
parameters.label: Method for Classes
parameters.description: Method to define classes for classifying average pollen concentrations (default: exponential)

parameters.name: --nClasses
parameters.label: Number of Classes
parameters.description: Number of classes for classifying average pollen concentrations (default: 5)

parameters.name: --color
parameters.label: Color Palette
parameters.description: Color palette for the pollen calendar plot (options: green, red, blue, purple or black, default: green)

parameters.name: --interpolation
parameters.label: Interpolation
parameters.description: Apply interpolation to complete gaps in the pollen data (default: TRUE)

parameters.name: --intMethod
parameters.label: Interpolation Method
parameters.description: Interpolation method (options: lineal, movingmean, spline or tseries, default: lineal)

parameters.name: --naRemove
parameters.label: Remove NA Values
parameters.description: Remove NA values for the pollen calendar (default: TRUE)

parameters.name: --result
parameters.label: Result Type
parameters.description: Output type for the function (options: plot or table, default: plot)

parameters.name: --legendName
parameters.label: Legend Title
parameters.description: Title of the legend in the plot (default: Pollen / m3)
